trans-unit.source: Provides an editing user interface (UI) for a data control field.
trans-unit.target: Fornece uma interface de utilizador (IU) edição de um campo de controlo de dados.

trans-unit.source: This editor is used internally by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> controls.
trans-unit.target: Este editor é utilizado internamente pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView>controlos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DetailsView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataControlFieldTypeEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.DataControlFieldTypeEditor"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Edits the specified value, using the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> and <xref:System.IServiceProvider> objects.
trans-unit.target: Edita o valor especificado, utilizando especificado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> e <xref:System.IServiceProvider>objetos.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that indicates the context of the object being edited.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> indica que o contexto do objeto que está a ser editado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IServiceProvider> containing a reference to the associated designer.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.IServiceProvider>que contém uma referência para o estruturador associado.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The final value of the object after it has been edited.
trans-unit.target: O valor final do objeto após foi editada.

trans-unit.source: Gets the editing style associated with this editor, using the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo de edição associado este editor, utilizando especificado <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that indicates the context of the object being edited.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> indica que o contexto do objeto que está a ser editado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref> value representing the editing style of this editor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"> </xref> valor que representa o estilo de edição deste editor.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Modal" name="Modal" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido é <xref uid="langword_csharp_Modal" name="Modal" href=""> </xref>.
